heroHeader.title: Craft your Legacy on
heroHeader.description: Dive into endless adventures with a thriving community. Build, battle, and explore the limitless possibilities. Join us today!

about.subtitle: About this Server
about.titleRight: just a Server; it's a Journey
about.description: Born from a passionate coding community, this server was created to bring us all together for fun and adventure. Join us as we build, explore, and enjoy the game we love in a space designed for collaboration and creativity.

respectful.title: Respect All Players
respectful.description: Maintain a friendly and inclusive atmosphere where everyone feels welcome.

noGriefing.title: No Griefing
noGriefing.description: Protect the hard work of others. Griefing is strictly prohibited to ensure a positive experience for all.

collaborative.title: Collaborative Builds
collaborative.description: Team up with fellow players to create massive, awe-inspiring structures that push the boundaries of Minecraft.

activeModeration.title: Active Moderation
activeModeration.description: Our dedicated staff is always available to assist and ensure that the server remains a safe and enjoyable place for all players.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Get up-to-date information on the server's performance and player activity.

version.title: Version
version.description: Stay updated with the latest features and improvements. Our server runs the newest version to ensure you have the best gameplay experience.

players.title: Current Players
players.description: Be active and join the fun!

uptime.title: Uptime
uptime.description: Our server is almost always online, ready for your next adventure.

plugins.title: Custom Plugins
plugins.description: Enjoy a tailored gameplay experience with our custom-developed plugins.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Explore a curated selection of breathtaking screenshots and highlights from our server. See the creativity and adventures that make our community unique.

preFooter.title: Ready to Join the Adventure?
preFooter.description: Don't miss out on the excitement! Dive into a world of creativity, challenge, and community. Click below to start your journey with us today.

copyServerIP.title: Server IP is copied to clipboard!

error404.title: Nothing to see here
error404.description: The page you're trying to access doesn't exist. You may have entered the address incorrectly, or the page might have been moved to a different URL. If you believe this is a mistake, please contact support.
